mems.content: Created sequential-orchestration skill at skills/sequential-orchestration/SKILL.md (284 lines). Covers: sequential vs parallel decision, gatekeeping factors (hierarchy, context purity, planning), delegation protocol with explicit return formats, boundary enforcement, unbroken link principle, context-first protocol, and red flags.
